description: This file defines a React functional component named UploadPanel that provides a drag-and-drop interface for uploading files (PDF, PPT, MD, TXT). It manages file selection, displays selected files, and performs a mock upload call to an API endpoint.

methods.name: onFilesSelected
methods.description: Handles file selection, filters files by extension, and updates state.

methods.name: onUpload
methods.description: Performs mock upload by posting filenames and sizes to the API endpoint, manages upload status.
